data.why:
Contributing to Perl-IPv6 integration. I do propose INET6, a very
    simple Object Interface to IPv6 API, achieved by Socket6 module, yet
    available, parallel to the existing one INET, for IPv4 . Hierarchy:
    IO::Socket::INET6. After installing, type perldoc IO::Socket::INET6
    for more info.

meta.subject: PAUSE ID request (MONDEJAR; Rafael Martinez Torres)
